reviewtext: Junk. These things lasted no time with my girls mp3 player. All she did was ride her bike and listen to them but the wires are so thin they constantly were shorting out. I would find the short, fold it up and tape it in position to work for her but after a couple fixes I just bought her some better ones. She likes the new ones. They didn't come from Amazon.
